Package com.grzm.pqconninfo.alpha

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Context
    Interface representing access to the underlying system context.
    EnvVars
    Abstraction for fetching environment variable values allowing us to substitute our own environment variable source for testing.
    PqConninfoOptionsReader
    A PqConninfoOptionsReader provides the read method to return a PqConninfo instance from a given system context.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseContext
    Implementations of Context methods common to all implementations.
    Passfile
    Functions for finding a password in a given passfile input stream.
    PosixPassfile
    libpq checks the permissions of the passfile on Unix systems.
    PqConninfo
    Interface defining the getters for conninfo options.
    PqConninfoReader
    Utility class to serve as a convenient API for creating PqConninfo instances.
    ServiceFile
    ServiceFile provides a static method for parsing service file input streams.
    SystemContextFactory
    Helper to inspect the given system and create the appropriate Windows or Unix Context.
    SystemEnvVars
    EnvVars implementation that fetches environment variable values from the underlying system using System.getenv(String).
    UnixContext
    Unix (or rather, non-Windows) specific Context implementation.
    WindowsContext
    Windows-specific Context implementation.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PqConninfoOption
    Enumerated conninfo options corresponding roughly to _internalPQconninfoOption in interfaces/libpq/fe-connect.c.
    PqSslmode
    Enumerated SSL mode values.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MalformedServiceFileException
    An exception thrown when an error is encountered when parsing a service file.
